reviewSection.efficiencyContent:
Wow, ACON3D plays
a big part in saving time!

contents.title: Why do you use ACON3D?
contents.content:
As a creator that does Webtoon professionally, it can be taxing trying to keep up with the weekly upload schedule; this is why ACON3D plays a big part in saving time.

Instead of drawing out the backgrounds that can take you hours, you can export readily made ones in just a matter of a few seconds.

contents.title: What are the benefits of using ACON3D?
contents.content:
What I like about ACON3D is that they have a wide variety of backgrounds readily available onthe site, with diverse ranges you can select from. Doing a story where the setting is in space? ACON3D hasit. What about a story in the medieval era fighting dragons and ruling over castles? ACON3D too, has that,which is not limited to only backgrounds.

There is also an extensive library of brushes, 3D models, high-quality image materials andmany more. Multiple sources of materials to help aid your webtoon can help shave off hours of workload.Always work smarter, not harder.

contents.title: Why do you use ACON3D?
contents.content: I use ACON3D to streamline my workflow. Working as a comic artist means I'm constantly on a tight deadline. With ACON3D's models, I can add in backgrounds easily and in proper perspective (using SketchUp) so I can focus more on the character action.

contents.title: What are the benefits of using ACON3D?
contents.content: The backgrounds purchased from ACON3D are all for commercial usage. There's a variety of different models to choose from all at differing price ranges. They also offer single 3D assets (some of which are free), and have a surprisingly vast collection of brushes that can provide anything from VFX to background characters.

contents.title: Why do you use ACON3D?
contents.content: 3D background models for making my webcomic :)

contents.title: What are the benefits of using ACON3D?
contents.content: It's super helpful when having a weekly update schedule making webcomic! I'm so happy it's accessible to internationals.

howtouseSection.title: How to Use 3D Models

purchase.title: Purchase a 3D model
purchase.content: Download the model from User Home. Install softwares (Sketchup) to successfully open the file!

setuptheanglue.title: Set up the angle
setuptheanglue.content: Find the perfect angle that matches your drawing and export/capture the screen.

drawcharacter.title: Draw characters on the scene
drawcharacter.content: Draw your character on the exported scene with Photoshop or Clip Studio.
